channel.title: CVE Feed for SECOM -- Dr.ID Access control system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SECOM -- Dr.ID Access control system

item.title: CVE-2024-7731|2024-08-14T13:23:19.734Z -- secom -- dr.id%20access%20control%20%20system
item.description: Dr.ID Access Control System from SECOM does not properly validate a specific page parameter, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to inject SQL commands to read, modify, and delete database contents.
